title: The MF new stuff is cool and all, but..............
body:
I still don't really feel rewarded for playing a champ with no escape, like her only source of being able to avoid threats is her speed. For example, it feels really good to bait and juke out the blitz hook with my speed, but then when I act on the blitz not having the hook, and pop an auto or two on the enemy I just get my passive proc'd by minions.
The W mechanic is cool because it refreshes the passive, but yet again, if another minion auto is coming towards me, I still lose my passive. I feel much safer when I play other AD's, because when you think about it, when a Trist pops some autos off and she draws minion aggro, does she have to immediately Rocket jump out of the situation?
I think Riot is going in the right direction with the MF changes, however I still think that something should be done to her passive, or her kit in general to make me really feel like having the high move speed to dodge all these skill shots is worth having over something like an blink or dash.
Ideas:
Her W makes her gain even more speed than she normally would have when active, and she can't lose it until the active is over.
Or make minions not be able to proc her passive.

replies.body: It was obvious she will still remain bad...
She brings nothing unique to lane. Others have dashes, higher damage ults, jumps, hard cc, extreme poke range, etc. She still has no unique niche in the meta.

She brings an auto reset, and very high early game damage, along with very good harass and waveclear. She also brings decent AoE damage early and midgame.

So, what?

I've tried explaining that Miss Fortune is actually a LOT stronger than the community makes her out to be. But they refuse to believe any champion is good until they're a popular LCS pick or just flat out broken or overpowered.

But yeah, she has the best auto attack reset in the game since it does damage itself, her early game is easily the best of any ADCs including Caitlyn, though Caitlyn is definitely a lot safer, and her mid game is so strong that it can end games before she even hits her late game fall off if she's left unchecked.

It's really annoying how people will swear to god that Zilean is the most broken piece of trash that needs to be gutted, and people will promise you that Kalista is underpowered by all means. It's because people are sheep. Mind you, that for the longest time Miss Fortune was considered overpowered and people wanted her to be gutted too. She wasn't gutted like some champions (cough kassadin cough) but she was nerfed fairly and is a really healthy, strong champion that can be scary in the right hands.

I'm not saying she's not good in the right hands. I'm just saying that a player will have to put in more effort into MF to reap the same rewards other adcs can do for less. And that's not fair to the champion or the player.

What I can say is that she has very good kite ability. But I'd much rather just pick ashe for that personally. :(

Her ult can't even crit which is the main reason ADCs are so dangerous. She does a fuckton of damage but it's indiscriminate. In many scenarios she will end up getting the entire enemy team to half without killing a carry.

I just play graves for this scenario. A Shotgun Ult combo will decimate entire teams better imo. The only way mf can be better is if she has {{item:3071}}. But that requires her to have been successful in lane.

The grievous wounds were the only thing that actually made her unique...
I honestly have no idea why they removed this. :\ She was the best counter to {{champion:37}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:16}} lanes

Personally, I'd like if her W had a couple less stacks, but the stacks gave more damage, that way she didn't have to go so deep just to get something other than the AD portion of her AA's to do damage. Her AS isn't all too great, her Q doesn't do 100% of her AD, it does 80% on the first and 100% on the second so it's not all that powerful beyond using it to harass in lane or a quick mini-AA. She has 2 AD ratios as an ADC and neither are very good. Q is 80%, W is 6% per stack, going up to 5 to 8 stacks depending on level of R, which is 30% to 48% of her AD per AA. That sounds nice, but you need to do 4 hits PRIOR to getting to the 30% and 7 hits PIOR to getting the 48% boost. It's also magic damage, so it doesn't scale well in the late game, so building AS to get the stacks up ends up costing you since building IE and a crit item nets much more DPS in the long run. I mean.. at max AS, you can only get 5 stacks per 2s, which is 2.5 attacks per sec, the current max. That's if you're standing there perfectly and letting it do the AA's for you since orb-walking with max AS is harder than BoxBox's Riven Animation Cancelling. lol.
Or, while her Impure Shots is active, Strut cannot be disabled at all for the duration. That'd be healthier compared to "more speed" AND "cannot lose until it's over."

I should have phrased that better, but that was basically what I was going for. My only thing with it just being her passive while W is active, is that she needs something for her mobility. So I figured a little extra speed on top of a Strut while Impure shots is active would be a decent solution.

Honestly I think activating impure shots as an escape has only saved me 2 times now. I active it for team fights for the AS but that wasn't even buffed like they said they would when the MF update was first announced. They also nerfed her angle on her q down to 60 from 100 I believe making it harder to be a lane bully like she is known for.

Here's how you make her viable.

Minion immunity to strut knockoff at level 11 (none of this "rush Bloodthirster" crap).

Give her 2 / 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 passive magic penetration per level of Impure Shots.

Lower the magic damage AD Ratio of Impure Shots down to 5%, but have it be able to crit (Bullet time will still scale the # of stacks of Impure Shots).

Boom!  She becomes less oppressive early game, carries harder into the late game.
My problem with the MF update is that it doesn't make sense for me to be dueling and use my w and lose the reset on the passive.

Yeah sometimes...Ive pressed W hoping to find more speed....I think the "rework" left her in a bad spot, the buildpath on her is weird and its all over the place now....you must build BT to have a shield and kite ppl with your strut and not suffer from minion taking it away, but then teamfights begins and since you dont have IE, it feels like you dont have damage....so you build IE, but then you dont have AS....so you build AS but then you dont have armor penetration...etc etc...while the other adc builds IE some vampiric scepter and Zeal, and it may helps them through mid game....with MF you cannot do that, since her passive and her w ask you to build life steal/damage on her.

The strut doesnt scale with lvl, like they told in her announcement...I dont know id this is a bug or it is supposed to be in this way, they didnt say nothing about it.

Other thing is her Q, last hitting with it to have the 150% damage on the other adc or enemy and of course the enemy is not behind any last hit minion...so her early laning power/bully is gone or well not gone but its harder to do it....in teamfights it useless, before she always hit 150% of her damage.

Her w feels weaker....it should scale...6% of her AD damage as bonus magic damage all the game becomes nothing if they build some MR, since it doesnt benefits from armor penetration....and lower the stacks you need, the girl only have 550 of range and no mobility...is a lie that youre going to reach the 8 stacks. 

Her e....should not have a cast time....even more now, that it last 2 seconds.

And her ult....should have a AD scale, I mean is not like they cannot dodge MF ult, or just jump to her while she is ulting...and like a said the girl only have 550 of range and no mobility...is a lie that youre going to reach the 8 stacks, to do 48% of you AD as magic damage.

She feels...generic to play....and I feel she doesnt bring much to the table...I mean why play her? because of her damage? her aoe damage? her movement speed?...I feel jinx, kalista, tristana, corki, ashe, caitlyn do that job and its safer, and more rewarding...and you dont just start falling off once you hit lvl 6.

And I dont know if this is happening just to me, because of the lag or idk (I play in lan with 60 of ping in na usually my ping is like 150) but her new aa is weird I find myslef canceling my aa because I press to move around...and the aa is not done.

Ive played Mf because she is my favorite champ...and ive been playing her since idk mid season 2, but its really hard to play her...and doesnt feel rewarding at all.

Her buildpath hasn't really changed.
Generally just build IE, PD, Greaves, LW, BT. 
Orders can change depending on matchups . Cleaver could be used if your team is all AD but it's still not too useful on her. Botrk is still decent on her with the %hp when she already deals ad +bonus magic on her autos. Only build that for high hp teams though otherwise it's outclassed.

I think the big thing is just not having minion damage ruin the passive after a certain level. I believe this has been suggested multiple times by different people before. This would really help out trying to chase people down in late game, but its still not asking too much seeing as how just an auto from a champion can turn it off too. As an MF main I do find it rewarding to play her still regardless and will always be a favorite.

Here's the thing:

1) Don't call me dumb when you can't spell check Valkyrie while typing ON THE INTERNET, let alone the lack of proper punctuation and capitalization.

2) You do realize the speed of Strut ramps up to something faster than Swift Boots, right? Like, the significance of just how much speed you're getting simply for not getting hit is more than people give credit for.

3) Strut can last indefinitely so long as you don't get hit. Corki's Valkyrie is simply a quick dash from one spot to the other. Given that she hasn't been hit along the way, MF would eventually catch Corki...or anyone else...before 17 seconds. You literally just can not outrun this character when Strut ramps up...and now we want that to be even stronger? We already bitch about Kalista and now this is a good idea?

4) Why can't Jinx, Varus, and Ashe be mobile in their own way? Because not every adc should be a speed fiend.
